text: Janusz Kurczab (6 September 1937 - 11 April 2015) was a Polish fencer, mountaineer and expedition leader. He competed in team épée events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Warsaw, Poland. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Competitors at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Polish fencers Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw Category:Mountain climbers
title: Janusz Kurczab
